name: HUDD Pilot :- A Cold-Blooded Killer
description:
(The game is best played downloaded on your pc)

Welcome to HUDD. One of the best detective agencies out there. They solve a myriad of mysteries, but they specialize in Homicides and Unusual Deaths (HUDD lol)

You are Officer Razor

who is new to this detective business and is aided by Senior Officer Ace

And Senior Officer Tak

A murder has occurred in a mysterious manner and the key to solving this crime is... "Temperature" ????

This game was made for "Level Up Circle's Beginner Jam #1" where the theme is "Temperature is the Key"

All sprites and images are made by me
